name: Silent Sound CD
description: Iain Forsyth & Jane Pollard’s Silent Sound features an original score by J. Spaceman (aka Jason Pierce from Spiritualized) and an introduction by Dr. Ciaran O’Keeffe. Recorded live at St. George’s Hall, Liverpool on 14th September 2006. This special package designed by Chris Bigg and Vaughan Oliver at V23 is strictly limited to 1000 numbered copies, each signed by Iain Forsyth & Jane Pollard and J. Spaceman. Listen to an excerpt here and for more information please visit silentsound.info
